entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING, Berens River
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:22 a.m. CDT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow. High minus 3.
